abstracts.cdata!:
The Northeast Urban Flood Reconstruction
            Project will seek to assist the physical and economic
            rehabilitation of flood-damaged urban municipalities in the
            Northeast region, and to strengthen the planning capacity at
            the regional, state and municipal levels for flood
            protection and control. It will comprise priority elements
            of the Government's flood reconstruction program and
            will include: (a) rehabilitation and reconstruction of
            shelter; (b) rehabilitation of urban infrastructure; (c)
            repair and reconstruction of community facilities and public
            buildings; (d) provision of financial and technical
            assistance to micro enterprises; and (e) provision of
            technical assistance to municipalities in the planning and
            management of reconstruction activities and to federal,
            regional and municipal agencies in flood risk assessment and management.
